scripts.flow: npx lerna run flow --stream --scope @avocode/better-react-tagsinput && npx lerna run flow --stream --scope @avocode/avocode-email-tagsinput && npx lerna run flow --stream --scope playground
scripts.start:all: npx concurrently "npx lerna run copy-api-docs --scope playground" "npx lerna run build:watch --scope @avocode/better-react-tagsinput" "npx lerna run flow:libdef:watch --scope @avocode/better-react-tagsinput" "npx lerna run build:watch --scope @avocode/avocode-email-tagsinput" "npm start"
